node.title: Libraries, halls, pools: The list of where unvaccinated Queenslanders can and can't go from Friday
node.alt: a man with a face mask in a suit jacket and jeans walks past Brisbane's city hall in daytime.
node.description: The ABC has compiled this guide to current vaccination requirements by council area in the South-east Queensland region ahead of Friday's changes.Â
node.content:
["Queensland councils are finalising how restrictions will work for non-vaccinated visitors to community facilities such as libraries and pools from December 17.", "Several councils have expressed concern in the past month about the lack of detail in the state's announcements about restrictions for non-vaccinated visitors and have sought clarification from the health department.", "Following the release of the public health directions last week, councils have been wading through the details\u00a0to determine what council-owned facilities will be affected and how.", "To make it easier, we have compiled this\u00a0guide to current vaccination requirements by council area.", "While state-owned galleries, art museums and libraries require vaccination, council-owned libraries do not\u00a0as they are deemed to provide essential services.", "Local Government Association of Queensland chief executive Alison Smith said councils would comply with the state's public health directions \"as they are required to do by law\".", "The restrictions imposed now apply to people aged 16 years and over, and require every visitor to use the Queensland Check-In app.", "
Brisbane City Council
", "Brisbane City Council said it would follow the state's public health directives which \"does not apply to numerous venue types across Queensland, including council libraries and pools\".", "Council-owned galleries and event spaces such as the Museum of Brisbane and the Powerhouse will require vaccination.", "
City of Gold Coast
", "A council spokesperson said no decision had yet been made on council-owned facilities.", "", "
The Gold Coast is finalising potential restrictions according to state legislation.(ABC Gold Coast: Dominic Cansdale )
", "
Sunshine Coast City Council
", "Sunshine Coast visitors will be able to access some facilities if they are not vaccinated from December 17.", "No vaccination is required for:", "Vaccination is required for:", "
Logan City Council
", "Logan City Council announced on Friday that it would follow Queensland guidelines after seeking clarification from the state government.", "No vaccination is required for:", "", "
Vaccination will not be required for some Logan council facilities.(ABC News: Alex Papps)
", "Vaccination is required for:", "
Ipswich City Council
", "Ipswich City Council on Wednesday announced several restrictions for fully vaccinated residents.", "No vacciation is required for:", "Vaccination\u00a0is required for:\u00a0", "
Redland City Council
", "Redland residents will have the below restrictions from December 17:", "No vaccination is required for:", "Vaccination is required for:", "
Moreton Bay Regional Council
", "No vaccination is required for:", "Vaccination is required for:", "
Noosa Shire Council
", "Noosa council finalised its restrictions on Monday, following the state's advice.", "", "
Some council facilities in Noosa will not be open to non-vaccinated visitors.(ABC Sunshine Coast: Owen Jacques)
", "No vaccination is required for:", "Vaccination\u00a0is\u00a0required for:", "
Scenic Rim Regional Council
", "Scenic Rim Regional Council did not respond by deadline.", "Last week the council supported a motion to \"implore that the Queensland government only include in COVID-19 public health directions, mandatory requirements that demonstrate strong risk-based assessment, to avoid dividing our community by placing severe mental and financial hardship on our local business owners, their employees, residents, and members of the public\".", "
Somerset Regional Council
", "Somerset council will meet on Thursday to\u00a0discuss a petition presented by members of the public concerned about the state requirements for mandatory vaccination to access some facilities.", "", "
Vaccination is not required to enter council-owned libraries across Queensland.(ABC News)
", "\"Council officers are presently reviewing the directions to understand impacts and modify our business practices applying our best effort to implement the directions,\" a report to be presented to the council said.", "\"With the support of the executive team, the CEO will take a risk-based approach regarding Workplace Health and Safety in implementing the directions to maintain a safe workplace for staff and visitors.\"", "
Lockyer Valley Regional Council
", "A Lockyer Valley spokesperson said unvaccinated residents would be permitted to use the council's libraries, but would not be able to access the Lockyer Valley Art Gallery.", "", "
Why we hear about some COVID-19 variants more than others
"]
